item.title: Employers Need Help Managing Workers Who Are Taking Second Jobs
item.description: A new survey of U.S. employees shows many are turning to additional employment because they’re under financial strain.

item.title: 3 Mistakes to Avoid When Bringing AI Into Your Company
item.description: Here’s why you should treat generative AI like a new team member, and not just another type of tech solution.

item.title: Two Big Fights over DOGE go to Supreme Court
item.description: What cases are left on the Supreme Court’s emergency docket? Here’s a look.

item.title: My Employee Is Bad at His Job but Keeps Saying He’s Doing Great
item.description: His self-hype is out of touch with reality. Is this salvageable?

item.title: The Stock Market Isn’t Buying the Bears’ Gloomy Outlook
item.description: The S&P 500 just posted its best May since 1990.
